      • saveContent

        public static java.lang.String[] saveContent(com.linecorp.bot.client.MessageContentResponse responseBody,
                                             java.lang.String type)
        Controller use this static method to save content from the InputStream specified in the response body.
        Parameters:
        responseBody - the response body get from LINE Messaging Client
        type - can either be TempFile (will return uri of the temp image) or DB (the extension and encoded string)
        Returns:
        will either return the bordered image's uri or extension + encoded string

      • addBorder

        public static java.lang.String addBorder(java.io.File tempFile,
                                         java.lang.String type)
        Add border to a image file to facilitate OCR recognization.
        Parameters:
        tempFile - temporary file stored on server or local machine
        type - can either be test or server
        Returns:
        uri of the bordered image file

      • getCouponImageUri

        public static java.lang.String getCouponImageUri(java.lang.String userId,
                                                 java.lang.String encodedString,
                                                 java.lang.String extension)
        Store the encoded string retrieved from DB to a temp file.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user to be sent
        encodedString - the encodedContent string retrieved from DB
        extension - retrieved from DB
        Returns:
        the temp file's uri

      • inputToTempFile

        public static java.lang.String inputToTempFile(java.lang.String extension,
                                               java.io.InputStream inputStream)
        Store content into a temporary file.
        Parameters:
        extension - the extension of the desired file format, corresponding to its MIME Type
        inputStream - the inputStream to get ByteStreams
        Returns:
        the temporary file's uri
